title: CVE program faces swift end after DHS fails to renew contract
author: healsdata
aiHeadline: The DHS, in a stunning display of incompetence, has managed to single-handedly dismantle the CVE program, leaving the world's cybersecurity efforts in the hands of a bunch of cats who just walked across the keyboard.

title: Attention K-Mart Shoppers
author: rpmisms
aiHeadline: K-Mart shoppers, you're special! So special, in fact, that the FBI has issued a warning about your online activities. Because clearly, you're the only ones sophisticated enough to evade their surveillance.

title: CVE Foundation Launched to Secure the Future of the CVE Program
author: layer8
aiHeadline: The CVE Foundation has launched, and guess what? They're here to save the CVE program from itself! Because clearly, the previous attempts by the DHS to manage it were a resounding success.

title: European Union Vulnerability Database (EUVD)
author: stefankuehnel
aiHeadline: The European Union has unveiled its brand-new Vulnerability Database, because what the world really needs is another acronym to remember. And another layer of bureaucracy to slow things down.

title: Markov Chain Monte Carlo Without All the Bullshit (2015)
author: ibobev
aiHeadline: Markov Chain Monte Carlo Without All the Bullshit? Sure, let's try that. Because nothing says 'fun' like hours of staring at equations, wondering if you've just wasted your life.
